#  Press Release Details 

# 

Allegro MicroSystems Wins Embedded Computing Design’s Electronica 2024: Best-In-Show Award 

11/20/2024 

[PDF Version](/node/9841/pdf)

### Allegro's A89224 Automotive SoC Recognized for Innovation at Electronica 2024 

MANCHESTER, N.H., Nov. 20, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- [Allegro MicroSystems, Inc.](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=Wv5vivb_G6dsVo34sNLUcqbIzOIXqquzL-oGVOfg1_TdeB4rQrBum4DI4drukWZ3A3yz_XrfXA4WAi0PCarZhYi4GNnOmJcx8V0UqfaIjWhXYnNmPn53zcw-Ic-D9qxtq34NDzYyXZM2DOQYUcWaRn1FGAe0NYP1K6CJvYr0I1CW4Q1QeMFTA9QcdZnQWewGMh0Z8B0zrDnqzdvDV-o1lTrPQRFHwcDN9yMYcmv02hFX1ApcVpSt9Vm-8NgdjrWOTwEEe1ekmMwALl4YyselYN3OBL0DuH4GRCZZRBwldK8=) (“Allegro”) (Nasdaq: ALGM), a global leader in power and sensing solutions for motion control and energy efficient systems, today announced that its [A89224](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=gt_BoqqY8M-_q9dBHo9cpK7sl6Ksdcpucs67dre8YsAwlFoLxFTsmg12RAFWmQz77RCWMKoSr1mWbufaNiU6hCwplGm6XlXdfxY_Fpmq6xPR8RQBv3Uf7vqtUlLlVhOoVw8GCaomWVxWFHnNVjLUNw==) automotive System-on-a-Chip (SoC) has won the [Electronica 2024: Best-in-Show Award](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=E4bzBHRn3AB_huQMYPsuk9JmO25tgjgtFzj-HRTP-IuV0I7JiOLpdesyvovD22bPnccY2fkiuXATnpdS4f2MOUYr7h3FKhVYEZDB-7BdcvhIGREC_DHx83twTuKpaAmUz5YdriAN53nmATLacJoyjV2aEDoNC_poeecTAugBtcJRZPSxIY3kyxf1NaqwjlIf), presented by [Embedded Computing Design](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=7Gh5GZerkxhxHSQ-wTeXCUem_yse9_XZoYTxNRqUzdGrWIMoqFXYPK4sEkmXKB1MyeRu7j7huhx5BOVdOa7q1V6tDvq93ruthO-1mKONPtA=). The award ceremony took place on November 12, 2024, at [Electronica](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=E4bzBHRn3AB_huQMYPsuk3J_i3XSXiI-TnOIwRxrTroELM2MTMeShmAgPRSt7zWn2R6U2rpOY7luxcJvLrT0wt3Q1v0dmf6PXEvgNYQeOxBYtmLLuSvETtXiREaf_41w6-7FqkPAhzZjzBgBiiLbnpZ3VmFZO5wYH94U6Ioq0Y7U2t6fR8k7M-yL8Nk_izcroVcrQTLNBV_AnDG4ujLqol9nGVD7bvuxnuuoAqU4mkU2kW1Ip9ImCEmycMLh-q6bHnWj8CAneeh-f5Vkir8erIPfTDMFsjPc6_lb6z7uVB7v8qoyKt_GWcUT_JsZZb3CHg_sHYGIcXnEiVw9KnFFMuJ0UGOHYW_w0uRDPLBqyrM=) in Munich, Germany.

The A89224 is a high-performance automotive SoC featuring an integrated 90V MOSFET driver, optimized for advanced motor control in 24V and 48V automotive systems. As a control hub, it powers various automotive functions, ranging from power windows and seats to advanced safety mechanisms. This innovative solution delivers high performance and efficiency, contributing to safer, smoother and more comfortable driving experiences. 

"We are honored to receive the Best-In-Show Award at Electronica 2024. This recognition demonstrates our dedication to delivering innovation in power and sensing solutions,” said Vineet Nargolwala, President and CEO of Allegro MicroSystems. “The A89224 SoC is a testament to our commitment to advancing technology that enhances performance, efficiency and reliability for critical applications in eMobility, clean energy and industrial markets. This achievement is made possible by the incredible Allegro team and their passion for innovation and customer success.” 

**Learn More** Discover how Allegro’s A89224 SoC empowers automotive manufacturers to create smarter and more efficient solutions. Visit [AllegroMicro.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=Wv5vivb_G6dsVo34sNLUcuaqpAnDqft6wOGbKzjmMD92TKyzbqDS-kGZTqfRXJHDJhz64he5y5oNs2BllLTM2oD9W2M3aicM2eJNhIW1PaGNUuhI8sc3gTBztCqVqWBCNfFA_OvT7dNp-FSAUTLkor7829LPX5OqAtHYo_pVCro=) to explore this innovative technology. 

**About Embedded Computing Design** Embedded Computing Design is the leading source of “how-to” technical information for embedded developers, providing design articles, videos, blogs, virtual conferences, podcasts, and more. Topics cover AI/machine learning, automotive, IoT, industrial security, IoT and medical applications. 

**About Allegro MicroSystems** Allegro MicroSystems, Inc. is leveraging more than three decades of expertise in magnetic sensing and power ICs to propel automotive, clean energy and industrial automation forward with solutions that enhance efficiency, performance and sustainability. Allegro’s commitment to quality drives transformation across industries, reinforcing our status as a pioneer in "automotive grade" technology and a partner in our customers' success. For additional information, please visit [https://www.allegromicro.com/en/](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=n_nL6-AUCL0J-9NSJjUuRPqu7cVHE3CshQaDczfvo8ku5QpBGGXMgH8Eg4woYYJf0b9XZqqLCLE0DnxZZggxKtcSuEmYXFtWCbHwTt-dc176aQPAFIStybXQ4ZaasFDn6psL-L9nTKUFsoeC0CfC6DKJzEGcpArgFHAvP7knmnBos-awPbEUg4sIUBh25byM5hmn1R9Eg4kYvbJrs54DjzG4aZAv0hlFukJL5NBtjhGy6V9Ed7NXz7itdwoIhI-WHBs50fvQQw5Gv-sxPqak6DpA22y7YVddIKqRNfcPLaA=). 

**Media Contact:** Tyler Weiland Corporate Communications (972) 571-7834 [tweiland.cw@allegromicro.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=yOykE0BAmAhkysAQSk6f8YYgL7pcmiRHNSmTqjchPk5J2gaxkiuFmuFMIoABqCjqvT169t1X3u2BJhEQf898cec3Q16uuhCMc3w_ksgVhXf7FSK5y87mH6icn75SaFYi) **Allegro Contact:** Laura Kozikowski Sr. Director of Global Marketing [lkozikowski@allegromicro.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=OTuGN7JSDHQ8Ora55BMcwzafK87mJVemxqjL9pB0pumd5gZ5sVCc5TNUTyNS1Dg0q85fkWXV_9hsGHzbPP4aG4N6aFgZSWRplzE-YBHix8iOr0RRyBElJd8LieiBDIbt)

Allegro MicroSystems to Present at Wells Fargo’s 8th Annual TMT Summit on December 4, 2024

11/15/2024 

[PDF Version](/node/9821/pdf)

MANCHESTER, N.H., Nov. 15, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Allegro MicroSystems, Inc. (“Allegro”) (Nasdaq: ALGM), a global leader in power and sensing semiconductor solutions for motion control and energy efficient systems, today announced that the company will present at Wells Fargo’s 8th Annual TMT Summit on Wednesday, December 4, 2024 at the Terranea Resort in Rancho Palos Verdes, CA. Derek D’Antilio, EVP and Chief Financial Officer, is scheduled to participate in a fireside chat at 11:00 AM PST.

A live and archived webcast of the fireside chat will be available on the [Investor Relations](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=ZRdBZZzlh4bPKEZZVSBnh-ggqwwL2kdmJHLKpSReQCOHDSIGQSuh42yvOvwh5JI0qF8oR78CvqB9Vac1XTKJAFPgJSFI7E9RNlcypxj7Qd0=) page of the company’s website at [www.allegromicro.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=mHp9P1VHKDACBNFOJHcWxo_ju-fFEn3neZMIfVgd7Sly8Z_M4dAP18Ucr1DJYhManhdjTb5nGeHV-n8uEImwuEAe9VGXXelW1jUED-pC0RU=).

**About Allegro MicroSystems** Allegro MicroSystems is a leading global designer, developer, fabless manufacturer and marketer of sensor integrated circuits (“ICs”) and application-specific analog power ICs enabling emerging technologies in the automotive and industrial markets. Allegro’s diverse product portfolio provides efficient and reliable solutions for the electrification of vehicles, automotive ADAS safety features, automation for Industry 4.0 and power saving technologies for data centers and clean energy applications.

Contact: Jalene HooverVP of IR & Corporate CommunicationsPhone: +1 512 751 6526jhoover@allegromicro.com

#  Press Release Details 

# 

Allegro MicroSystems Introduces Advanced Magnetic and Inductive Position Sensing Solutions at Electronica 2024

11/12/2024 

[PDF Version](/node/9791/pdf)

### New Solutions Enhance Accuracy, Efficiency, and Reliability While Reducing Power Consumption by up to 50% Compared to Existing Switches and Latches

MANCHESTER, N.H., Nov. 12, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- [Allegro MicroSystems, Inc.](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=wTuFSoYOVLVN0k9pmDOPgIYywmGuJDneJmRtb2QF9eNedjf9SllLS3DsfpteiRUWjHPIrxEwwVmSPOGTbRfKnGIv7EVQWqF2EhraZkwwHg9sBlJzbZ_ZcU6pAIQdjSZyuAec88YfKU5hAvS2JUnMFg5NYI9d6XA_mcFNq6SimvMj0hDLAd1GwkHY5YKPWxQc2nwp7vdUkEhfMjWG8Fd2JoX5O-oiwVJ1_k20uoV2B-rvNN42evFyP-MWE05BBURw) (“Allegro”) (Nasdaq: ALGM), a global leader in power and sensing solutions for motion control and energy efficient systems, today at Electronica 2024, introduced its new inductive position sensors and a series of micropower magnetic switches and latches. These advanced sensing products lower system costs, extend battery life and offer reliable performance across a variety of automotive, industrial and consumer applications. 

The new [micropower magnetic switches and latches](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=AcLR2b92aHkd8Lwizf1tSEg1nO_QI7-5vgZdGHX9CG_1Ec75CDK_wOGHGEtH8P8wRg2B_Gj9qXffdakTEmqNkbLCG71vn7yAB4S9uRe8SR95IxJNVPCSmLvZu23gtxSao_prYv56nIMWnHHCm1Ez0hAiT4pcOVE0D6uLbh1TX15nanqmNQrL_PmGFLfQ_s7i_0VgiClDKyQNBqST-Tk_objAzD6Zhi5mlBqCOgHeN4QlaIqLi9liume7OZVHUcOmu0sQlXt3FrNMRWzVCayvqp3ZzLx4DHm62f6GQchlSngUqwhHhCP0Oi2ElKqhHj6WYatpmjx7XI-pJq6R5Ofbyw==), [APS11753](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=eCBJrH1DFdG_s9bjlRVDTmhnLbloSKevapA4JYbAOahHRBmJkT0Gbz90u2bgglxScXBuYq8n3yDNufntftEnneB0_oLbTs2amvDOeBXUHhQxszaZ3Zc_dd3o-K2IiIKqBiSzcHIuN5TOocZZJBwqe-cSkIU2clEYpvdUObOcB21IAAW4reMRql1UcGTxJh1Ld65HpPEWP4T9PLanE8N7Wyl-Xd2u6gEBgbpIRPyiskZX4aYvUKLD9O7DL3SFxA7l0QlovftWMt8ggzuvjiu8Xj-k25ojSxcrgmdM8C1aPfk=) and [APS12753](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=UrpyqjzkoyYZXzq2L41j4jsKkQ0x5GYF8m8Nggcrys29jIpT4obr1HfuL_qxUEpGVtEBgJWT6UHdshYL7wYTnqc7RtF08JQJTjs5zwEwWlrCBnKuP34kIm_MPBzV6c3iT6h0YNYY7VgpV0CgiyNcZtkCVARLG5jhJJxBRUZWDX-2o1dWI0d1gH_A65MKWB3EOuZez4MxLzuuhDXVuaD-HmQR3FJeEyFdL0To7Eqj9Ln5IHTwaUbnL_AOmyrH8YFP1IrowIJSb0k38WoEmEcpq5R4cHXYPT4Lx905lTso5ok=), redefine position sensing with higher sensitivity options for enhanced air gap tolerance, and ultra-low power consumption using 50% less power than our existing micropower products. This makes them perfectly suited for challenging battery-powered applications in medical, consumer and industrial markets. 

"We are excited to announce our latest inductive position sensors as we continue to drive innovation in sensing technology,” said Ram Sathappan, Sr. Director, Global Marketing & Applications at Allegro MicroSystems. "Our inductive sensors deliver high accuracy, advanced diagnostics and connectivity options essential for safety-critical traction motors in electric vehicles, while the magnetic switches and latches enable designers to achieve reliable and energy-efficient position sensing in a variety of applications. We’re anticipating a lot of interest in our solutions and look forward to showcasing these innovations at Electronica.” 

**Key Features and Benefits of the**[**New Inductive Position Sensors**](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=bg8jndCYE-uARPc5ER-v5cPLj7CFgnkZKzzlUhin43qN8I6Yzl6x6D6F58cjCO92i_I0KHI_IxTdIPJ_-E-mt2821MUkTBQVBsuAHGAsRmyWumeoPQ_026WbmIfbHn2s3lNsnGoV8rmROPu_R2mNxVb6MQNwMWK4uIEy31S1hEJCQzdRyJPlAXycpA7N93YcbAu0wY3nKECx3BD9SrPm_wwQnAw6tHKGDkyycCwrcfP5ONlFbrc-TCSNUPlm7BJHaSr68nVSRuN9mWWHqvikl6-81NxQcOBgdU4tOWMg6ikbdpLDuBTVJ7YpmSscRUlE)**(A17802 and A17803):**

  * **Precise Contactless Angle and Motor Position Sensing:** Enables dynamic speed and torque control for smoother motion, reduced vibration and energy savings. 
  * **Wide Temperature Range:** Maintains consistent performance and stability in extreme temperatures, ensuring reliability in harsh conditions. 
  * **Integrated Digital Compensation and Programmable Linearity:** Enhances accuracy and resolution while offering design flexibility. 



**Key Features and Benefits of the**[**New Micropower Magnetic Switches and Latches**](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=9X1ZgHz5rFgouK30dYkS8T1L1G4ziQRsnmjB5s3cYwALruBd3aaRB0CteDvEkq-ecso4LuyaA9KYTBMrb1kTEGG6sFHrlknce37N9WYf-6uc6nTQrMVZ1E-vT-hwE_eKCBS8wtoHHlPAMFm7gcyN9zgauL7DV_CVl_0o4GVDWMgGFJVVyJHfkyuoEpwnPuwSi4EaTWZhQ5scajEt-WdyNXKZNbdylNfrdG5VsUKue2XhgxzX0EelPPOKWQAe8SLPkaqcUqcnp917fAJExNtST0oty6o_LG-ZqKafL3371FoOCs90lzea6tyZfoOvFXjPDke9V0O1Tp8VoYWK2m30qskZQWHa2O5v7IPZ43Y2T0U=)**(APS11753 and APS12753):**

  * **Ultra-low Power Consumption:** Extends battery life, making them ideal for portable and wireless devices. 
  * **Design flexibility:** Wide offering of Magnetic sensitivity options provides design flexibility over a broad set of application needs ranging from stray field rejection to high sensitivity low magnetic field use cases. 
  * **Lower Total Solution Cost:** Greater magnetic sensitivity options compensate for mechanical misalignments and variations in magnetic field strength allowing for wider airgap variation and total cost savings 



Allegro’s latest solutions highlight its commitment to sensing innovation throughout 2024. Earlier this year, Allegro introduced the industry’s highest bandwidth current sensors [(ACS37030 and ACS37032)](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=zfQb-hm4G049m7dK_sVCC7dFeVPCrMTJPl-O39EhDA9W7_m9EaWXDaqPBeM05dgPyTx8PRTkjOjIOg1SzCKE_rHQQcy1czGAa5zxP5RwUAQQkhIiFQObMN01FrCTd86EFyplWFKmIn87xXUwrq-1NE59ui4NUyC2UdF_VkmMuGk_qlgjUMNGkbVj9Rj5Dj4Wu3h3B8KjSIlB1Npx08l2ni3pFj8CzYkOdF6fRneyi5PhumUdopR5qrDhUzCCJEppKwk00wOkc5hssda8IejLgEmaDuzV9_FBFs0qQFE6RZgqlbpNgMtUPiCppHwDXDkzZbRPPiuQKT8Ixk1Kw_EsOCmZIVEoX0MpjE4fEHYe2NS9-n-f8JbJwBTLov5oTLY4) designed for rapid response and minimal power loss in high-power density Silicon Carbine (SiC) and Gallium Nitride (GaN) systems. These solutions are widely used in electric vehicles, clean energy equipment, and data centers. Allegro also introduced [shunt replacement current sensors](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=7KccNPCRyKRdITktGtaEPMV1R0kwk76iRu28ahMR7785qEu4rYc06mDnx7TdiMmlL_aFUYvZhndDdmddIZ3X2-EOZ-4-OHMbNWu5HG_MfiL_ER4NTrAtOtPPa5mgGA56ZTTIJpwb0RnR0J-KHl0W_9wQMKgkjCMfk7iBycktHLbXVjji88fZJGEmhMPbc4lVE02waY2hdfN4MHwD3s4niZVxL5vfFHyeSqXTQ5oTHGQ6GV7nntIxpusSNSmTtjkVf4z08u9rie-Pf52N5PUFNvo9vyzJQ8ojoF_GYa1MEUwbpPhRP7KGDTmZRUt8A9MRYTGXaKMRSSzG7nxqwlbeGw==) ([ACS37220](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=kdfLSFtrFxheC-E3HcXH7rLi-ObJCYqHuqH6WWIcm9eJ4m8aMgpWFiG_Uoewzm1q97v_SBgK0iyv5GV2zoymOfOILTztWqK7cL-rwlYp_s3vu1YD82JhuV0vY2u00DRSbUCBFtKXtfPzdg268z_GteIbxQjTVuU5AOrIO3WJIkXYkIIjs1BMdrPieSg6q4wx9A5qQBTtf34uFr8oQtoO3rFIvD7nez6RpoWxaL9c0omJFQrwvTNpl7mNdaXeyJxAM4-aO59DL8KoHii6ekj6MTUKu68kpqFHXTG9T5O1VUO5qh3dAwxfEA9Njv3bhmZHMvhhqVmoZ4v52Xuu6AAGvSeDg5ZMSOKhON0xiXR7zQRmI--3pW-6YsOn4C0Q9-Ky) and [ACS37041](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=kdfLSFtrFxheC-E3HcXH7i1NgHe01wUVUpkXyEFbCEy4ZmYJv7hkIzlhBXmQpKcT4dCmL-i-N6OLk7Fz0c-sWXkcVqgN4lahNgZJTQIRNehqk8VDVtuWwuajdpcAondoZcPLsbIVkb2ZK_iEgrZ2oZUudBzIn_wW4-ER8ixT6mPha_6ftyIZaIjJh16Qxh0chkB6zAnDh33fzVbXppWzVhKqO-Ka47vlXOhy8e-5g36kfSdfBlXiTTCKnqsuPAu29mSds7wsmVT_VGSaa7nMAMVb70LaHaoD56d5blKpH6_yZy8ZHdWkxLnI_rCQLWl064wFo94vm1MnUI4nfoaAMaHbus7B7jztKgxezXySAuU=)) that reduce both energy loss and component count compared to traditional shunt-based solutions. 

Additionally, Allegro expanded its portfolio with the new [XtremeSense™ TMR](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=fyPWzuMa9XrP2aaKU29TyMHsNQ3Yh4TrkuxMV7rFnGHMxKt8jR-mnV34vvi9314drIViDEY_CfAhzAwLgJNSFMlqQcymZGHQmnKPkQn1klU2eQvkdQUZ4nNVTWjtB6sB90_g_7tEjl5mIT9IOYtN5ts1OzPk-L5OtPF9a4FemWh_WtkWlocrL3XlYDCnuEMaNHctKzc8QPdubs76MSpoLPh3w3uVnbvO4X76S65_ujcx1ifPXShzE4WZTZYXZFjF6z8ACAJrx76VQvNOALlwKxi2RmQY6TRiND4yZabJqNs=) sensors ([CT455](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=JzCiVely36fbRrd4_KFU2oh60NBEI9SAebNXObS7JqxxEal1L_g2bnDD-YATxXew_dg8Il0QN1kxfiUC4czC5aGavWblxC_sKmyqjJaJUterbAzzVKajDlvhUPl9kLTIwhAQVWJXFK_ZIcKOLBtO5AO1WJUv2sAONH2mQiQzFadND8WWWFFuWLpxjz0Fj7x2Z7LqHUzKwxWoEijEYAFjSpsq4N9MNGyNIZqpmwfYNs8gqeGjXkmmUsHOObwe3cc-Fje0gCKpruSSZs6G_ZQ1q_Jg1PMNwWIdl5mbibmVX96pPZ0qxDpJ87CpO_yaM56Nb3V1-wDNXaNlG8-nR2hB6n6C8r4s4MRW38MCuX1vU9Q=) and [CT456](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=r7kwpCJ4P_Ud6NRV2YnvOHB_tVKmRfHZCg2rDKlHnf0zcI4mTR3C1ZTbH3kXg-NFF2VJuWwlnllrgD_zLlmnJEY5R0YyDc7u2eD2gGkP_xg5sR2UvIdpmi9c2r-SCdDPHhYMSILKsMQjjb90ntjQR2enWpfo1kXT1-D7HV9PXNHGk5XD1WkKqkEajBbGFypoiy5gDP0eRoCRmw-jns5teVwEJiVI9l7xM8C8FgFgvzoBtqI2sPGlEq8fbksY8LRIgy71sCZGlXeN9Ebp3VmhCA2U_O3T_EiC0lhk4KA6-3C_lbksN9Sts47D-iXWHh_Pm8gXXp1f0qdKjIsw610EChm13Wo_mXITy7iGui7Cs1E=)), providing space and cost savings while improving energy efficiency. **About Allegro MicroSystems** Allegro MicroSystems, Inc. is leveraging more than three decades of expertise in magnetic sensing and power ICs, to propel automotive, clean energy and industrial automation forward with solutions that enhance efficiency, performance and sustainability. Allegro’s commitment to quality drives transformation across industries, reinforcing our status as a pioneer in "automotive grade" technology and a partner in our customers' success.
